com.mingyoutech.framework.util
类 SSHUtil

java.lang.Object
  com.mingyoutech.framework.util.SSHUtil

public class SSHUtil
extends java.lang.Object

SSH命令执行工具
使用案例.
String hostname = "10.0.0.99";
String username = "etl";
String password = "etl";
String env = "sh /home/etl/myetl/scheduler/web_calling.sh";
String sh = " nohup sh /home/etl/myetl/scheduler/project_runner.sh f09a8412303542f482b8ae13e12b95cd &";
sh = env + " " + "\"" + sh + "\"";
execSSHCommand(hostname, username, password, env, sh);

构造方法摘要
SSHUtil()
           
 
方法摘要
static void execSSHCommand(java.lang.String hostname, java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password, java.lang.String sh)
          远程SSH命令运行
 
从类 java.lang.Object 继承的方法
clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

SSHUtil

方法详细信息

execSSHCommand

public static void execSSHCommand(java.lang.String hostname,
                                  java.lang.String username,
                                  java.lang.String password,
                                  java.lang.String sh)
远程SSH命令运行

参数：
hostname - 主机IP
username - 用户名
password - 密码
sh - 运行命令
